description:
Dinner with Douki-kun has now turned into drinking with Douki-chan`s rivals. But Douki-kun pulls her aside to be alone with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekitotsu!! Kaisha no Kouhai vs Torihikisama no Senpai
They Clash!! The Junior Coworker vs the Business Client Senpai!
激突!! 会社の後輩vs取引先の先輩
